title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
description:
About Euka AI:

Euka is an AI-driven affiliate marketing automation platform. Top e-commerce brands use Euka to drive TikTok Shop sales. Produce winning content in partnership with trending creators, then multiply content with our suite of AI content generation tools.

Euka is one of the fastest growing AI startups in the valley, backed by Susa Ventures and Creator Ventures. We help brands of all sizes mobilize high-trust, low-cost attention at scale—by activating armies of small creators powered by AI. Our vision is to be the CHEAPEST way for brands to market their products by building an AI-enabled infrastructure that enables brands to collaborate with a network of high-performing creators.

Role Overview:

We're seeking an experienced full-stack software engineer to drive the technical vision and execution of our AI-powered platform that revolutionizes creator marketing. You'll work directly with our founders (Stanford / HBS grads) and a team of engineers in building scalable solutions that help brands discover, connect with, and measure the impact of creator partnerships through cutting-edge AI technology.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, architect, and implement scalable systems for creator discovery, outreach automation, AI-driven content analysis, and CRM features
  • Collaborate with product and design to translate business requirements into technical specifications
  • Ensure the reliability, security, and scalability of Euka’s infrastructure
  • Evaluate and integrate emerging AI technologies to keep Euka at the forefront of social commerce.

Qualifications:

  • 2+ years of software engineering experience
  • Strong expertise in modern full-stack application development technologies (React, NextJS, Python)
  • Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
  • Proficiency in database design and management (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis)
  • Experience with AI/ML frameworks and integrating LLMs into production systems
  • Solid understanding of microservices architecture and API design
  • Prior startup experience with rapid iteration and scale-up challenges.
  • Prefer candidates who can speak both English and Chinese and based in NA.

Company Culture

We're a hard-working, fast-paced team passionate about empowering creators and democratizing marketing. We value technical excellence, customer obsession, and continuous learning. Our company is remote-first, with engineers across North America, China, and Europe.

What We Offer:

  • Competitive base salary ($100,000 - $200,000) based on experience
  • Significant equity package with high growth potential
  • Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance
  • Equipment and home office setup allowance

How to Apply:

If you’re ready to drive growth and make an impact at Euka, please reach out to jeremy@euka.ai
